title: COCID-19: Interior ministry extends foreigners’ visas till June 30
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 29 (APP):The interior ministry Wednesday announced extension in all types of visas for foreign nationals, staying in Pakistan, till June 30, to facilitate them in the wake of coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.
“The competent authority has been pleased to further extend the validity of all types of visas issued to foreign nationals who are currently in Pakistan till June 30, 2020,” said an interior ministry notification.
It said all the departments concerned had been informed about the decision taken regarding the validity of the visas.
Earlier on April 3, in a notification, the ministry had extended the visas for all foreigners till April 30. This was the second extension granted to facilitate the foreigners living in Pakistan.
